I figured that since i "converted" a recent career for 1.0 from .90, that valentina would have to be hired, but i went into the debug menu and she doesn't show up at all, not even in uknowned. Any fix to this?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T20:32:58Z" title="04/28/2015 08:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Poofer**
I'm guessing you'd have to start a new career.

> 
> I figured that since i "converted" a recent career for 1.0 from .90, that valentina would have to be hired, but i went into the debug menu and she doesn't show up at all, not even in uknowned. Any fix to this?

Sadly, I don't think there is any easy way without doing a bunch of configing. I recommend starting a new career save ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

Figured as much. 

oh well, I'll keep mucking around with this career until all my mods update to 1.0
Import a craft with her in it?

ah yes, i've edited saves before to fix invalid ships....(removing a part from 10-12 ships ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif))
